body_html:
Hi @houqp.

We will maintain binary builds for

  • Latest CUDA major release (9.0)
  • Latest CUDA minor release (which was 9.1 at the time of release of 0.4.0, and 9.2 at the time of release of 0.4.1)
  • The last major release (8.0)

Hence, we are not releasing an official build for 9.1.

body:
Hi @houqp.

We will maintain binary builds for
- Latest CUDA major release (9.0)
- Latest CUDA minor release (which was 9.1 at the time of release of 0.4.0, and 9.2 at the time of release of 0.4.1)
- The last major release (8.0)

Hence, we are not releasing an official build for 9.1.
